text: James Milton Campbell, Jr. (known as Little Milton; September 7, 1934 â€“ August 4, 2005) was an American musician. He played rhythm and blues and electric blues. His hit songs and records included "Grits Ain't Groceries", "We're Gonna Make It" and "Just a Little Bit". He was born in Mississippi. He died following a stroke in Memphis. title: Little Milton
